pages.text: The Linker is a tool used to tear a rip in the world and piece them together in the quantum realm... You may use it as the tool for the $(l:flux:synthesizer)Synthesizer$(/l) recipes, or to link the $(l:io/box)Items$(/l) and $(l:io/battery)Power$(/l) Blocks respectively...
Requires first getting $(l:flux/flux_dust)Flux Dust$(/l) and using it along with an eye of ender in the $(l:flux/synthesizer)Synthesizer$(/l)
